title: Women Holding Hands Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents two women holding hands, one with a light skin tone and the other with a dark skin tone. It signifies romantic relationships, friendship, solidarity, or companionship between two women of different ethnicities.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully depicts two women's hands clasped together, showcasing a harmonious blend of light and dark skin tones with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. The subtle sheen on their skin and the gentle curvature of their fingers convey a sense of unity, partnership, and deep connection, rendered with the smooth gradients characteristic of Apple's design. This visual representation is commonly used to signify friendship, romance, or shared experiences, celebrating diversity and inclusivity in digital conversations on Apple devices.
